items.longDescription:
Roy Lichtenstein

Roy Lichtenstein was a forerunner and main figure in the pop art movement of the 1960â€™s. He established his vivid style by utilizing simple black outlines, bright primary colors found in ads and comics, and halftone dots used in newsprint. He is remembered fondly for depicting not only characters from comics, but also creating new works in his own style in dialogue with great historic artists like Picasso, Matisse, and Monet, among others.

© 2020 Estate of Roy Lichtenstein. All rights reserved.
Roy Lichtenstein™
items.name: WOMEN Roy Lichtenstein UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)

items.longDescription:
- Used compression denim that was jointly developed with Kaihara, the world's leading denim manufacturer.
- Used stretch thread for the wefts, giving them better kickback and compression when worn.

- Used special material that tightens around your stomach with just the right amount for the front pockets.
- Ankle-length, high rise, and skinny straight silhouette make your legs look sleek.
- The stitch colors are relaxed tones, so they can be paired with both casual and dressier styles.
- Legs that look even more slim, with laser processing that was achieved through repeated trial and error.
- In response to customer feedback, we made the fit slightly slimmer up to below the knees, to get lines that are not saggy.
